channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump sues Murdoch for $10 billion over WSJ story on Epstein birthday letter
item.description: President Trump is under increasing pressure to have the Justice Department release files about the late pedophile Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Justice Department asks court to unseal Epstein, Maxwell grand jury transcripts
item.description: The Trump administration's handling of the so-called Epstein files has spurred a growing backlash from within the president's own MAGA base.

item.title: FBI agents were told to 'flag' any Epstein records that mentioned Trump, Sen. Durbin says
item.description: President Donald Trump, bowing to days of pressure, asked Attorney General Pam Bondi to get grand jury testimony about Jeffrey Epstein unsealed.

item.title: U.S. stocks end mixed Friday, but S&P 500 and Nasdaq book weekly gains
Company insiders have gotten bearish. But these 11 stocks remain in favor.
Trump AG Bondi to seek release of Jeffrey Epstein case grand jury transcripts
item.description: President Trump has faced growing calls for Attorney General Pam Bond to reverse her decision to withhold evidence in the Epstein case from the public...

item.title: Trump pushes for up to 20% minimum tariffs on European Union: FT
item.description: Trump has escalated his demands on the EU following weeks of negotiations over a possible framework deal, the Financial Times reported.

item.title: Corporate America keeps calling consumers ‘resilient.’ Consumers beg to differ.
Trump signs Genius Act into law, in significant step for U.S. crypto regulation
Block is the latest to get an S&P 500 nod, and its stock is climbing
